0.1.name: wordpress/wp-server-date-time
0.1.description:
This plugin is useful when you want to know what date time & timezone is it on server where wordpress is hosted if you are in other timezone. Output looks like:

Server Date/Time: Sat 06th Dec,2008 11:17 am Server Timezone: America/Phoenix, (MST -07:00)

Version Change log:

v0.3 Minimize css code Supports upto Wordpress 3.5.1

v0.2 Added description before date time Added timezone information Changed text color from red to green

v0.1 Initial release
